post.author: 권칠환
post.content:
Salary Range:
65-75k plus bonus
Location:
Yonge and 401 area, Toronto  
JOB DESCRIPTION:

CVS-style document versioning support Automated Business Card Scanning for Address Book entries
Performance optimization of .net code used in synching MS Outlook Optimizing usability of Contact Profile in the company

Strong understanding of Object Oriented Programming
Design Patterns
Model-driven development methodologies
Exposure to enterprise application development
Scheme scripting and functional programming

TECHNOLOGIES:

Java
Eclipse
Scheme
DB2, Oracle, SQL Server
BlackBerry Device Software
JBoss, Websphere

EDUCATION:

Software Engineering, Computer Engineering, Systems Design Engineering or Computer Science background will be preferred.

Fraser Cameron
Email: fcameron@tundratechnical.ca
Phone: 416.915.7878 x 105
Fax: 1.866.664.2417
Toll Free: 1.866.9TUNDRA (988.6372)
post.title: Technical Product Manager
